description: This endppint https://qrcodegenerator-47jz.onrender.com/qrcode/download/{text} will take input from user , you can replace {text} with anything and it will generate response as QR code Image.
name: qr_code_api_generator_qr_code_generator

improvement: The previous description was too generic. The new description highlights the direct text-to-QR code generation, emphasizing its simplicity and effectiveness for text-based inputs. The name has been updated to be more concise and action-oriented, clearly stating its primary function of generating QR codes from text.
description: Instantly generates a QR code image directly from any text input. Simply provide the text you wish to encode, and this tool will deliver a perfectly formed QR code image.
name: generate_qr_code_from_text

improvement: The tool is performing well for text-based QR code generation, as indicated by the high selection rate and successful calls in the provided examples. However, it's not being selected for URL-based QR codes, where `qr_code_generator_v14_generate_qr_code` is preferred. To maintain its strength and improve its appeal for text, I'll slightly rephrase the description to emphasize its specialization in text while keeping the name focused on its core text-to-QR functionality. This reinforces its identity as the go-to for text inputs.
